name: a-Hathor
description: aHTR is the Arbitrum wrapped token of the Hathor Network native token (HTR). HTR is the native token of Hathor Network, a blockDAG innovative layer-1 blockchain that has been on mainnet since January 2020. By using the wrapped token, users are able to access Arbitrum's DeFi ecosystem using aHTR, and therefore HTR, as a token. You can find out more about Hathor and HTR on https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/hathor.
